sentence: In the crowded race to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey (R-Pa.), conservative commentator Kathy Barnette came in second place, while the poll showed hedge fund executive Dave McCormick in third place.
title: Governors get in on redistricting

sentence: — Pennsylvania Republican Mehmet Oz is up with a new ad attacking Dave McCormick as “China’s friend, not ours.” Oz and McCormick are two of the many Republicans running for Senate.
title: The FEC reports we can’t wait to see

sentence: Pennsylvania Republican Senate candidate Dave McCormick opposes increasing the federal minimum wage and wants to keep it at its current level of $7.25 an hour, set in 2009, when it was raised from $6.55.
author: Josh Israel
title: Super-Rich GOP Senate Candidate Says Keep Minimum Wage At $7.25

sentence: Although Pennsylvania’s TV airwaves have been filled with ads from Republican candidates Mehmet Oz and Dave McCormick attacking each other, the discourse on the air had been more civilized on the Democratic side.
author: Robert Farley
title: Pro-Lamb Super PAC Misfires in Attack Ad Against Fetterman
